titleStmt.title: Englands sorrowe or, A farewell to Essex with a commemoration of the famous liues, and vntimely deaths of many woorthie personages which haue liued in England. By W.H. gent. The contents follow in the next page.
titleStmt.author: W. H., gent.
Herbert, William, Sir, 1553?-1593, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Valentine Simmes] for Henry Rocket, and are to be sold at the long shoppe in the Poultrie vnder the Dyall,

notesStmt.note: Some print show-through; some leaves cropped.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
